posts.title: building my own lsm tree in java
posts.summary: I have read about LSM trees for years. I have skimmed papers, looked at production code, and nodded along as people explained compaction strategies on conference stages. But reading about storage engines and building one are very different experiences. So I decided to stop consuming and start implementing.

posts.title: Building a Distributed Rate Limiter
posts.summary: Rate limiting is a reliability feature, not a billing feature. Done well, it prevents cascading failure and keeps latency predictable under load.

posts.title: Hello, Blogs
posts.summary: This is the beginning of a static-first journal on systems, product engineering, and calm clarity.
